short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate refund amounts including tax and discounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Price Match Refund Calculator helps you calculate the difference, including tax, between two discount percentages as long as you have the tax rate and the original price of the item before taxes or discounts.
